docs.snippet: If you wanted to see clearly into how all the various components of the modern media ecosystem interact, you could not come up with a better real-time experiment than the Donald Sterling story....
docs.lead_paragraph: If you wanted to see clearly into how all the various components of the modern media ecosystem interact, you could not come up with a better real-time experiment than the Donald Sterling story.
docs.abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column discusses V Stiviano, woman whose voice appears on mysteriously leaked tape on which Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling is heard making racist comments; points out that as key player in scandal, she is looking to leverage her infamy into the big time, feeding media's appetite.

headline.main: A Key Player in a Scandal, V. Stiviano Feeds the Media’s Appetite
